## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                           |
| Rationale                         |  Ensures sufficient stock for the next 5 days, considering forecasted demand and potential fluctuations.  Utilizes vendor order quantities effectively and minimizes excess inventory. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  Higher than the player's planned 60,000 units to ensure sufficient stock for potential demand fluctuations.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  2.8 days                                |
